SEARCH
Package game.effects

Class SpawnActorEffect

java.lang.Object
game.effects.SpawnActorEffect
All Implemented Interfaces:
Effect
public class SpawnActorEffect extends Object implements Effect
An Effect that spawns a new instance of an Actor near a reference actor.

This effect uses a Supplier to generate a fresh instance of the actor to avoid reusing the same object multiple times. The actor will be spawned in an adjacent location around the reference actor (or the acting actor if reference actor is not provided).

This ensures that the spawned actor is always a new instance, preventing illegal state exceptions.

Example usage: 
     SpawnActorEffect effect = new SpawnActorEffect(() -> new OmenSheep(), null);
Author:
Mohanad

      public SpawnActorEffect(Supplier<Actor> actorFactory, Actor referenceActor)
      Constructs a SpawnActorEffect.
      Parameters:
      actorFactory - a Supplier that provides a fresh Actor instance
      referenceActor - the actor to spawn near (can be null to default to the acting actor)

      actor - the actor applying the effect (used as reference if referenceActor is null)
